means: 预先警告，事先告知( forewarn的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The Macmillan Guide had forewarned me of what to expect.
sentence.Network_cn: 《麦克米伦指南》已经事先告诫过我会遇到什么情况。

sentence.Network_en: The commander had been forewarned of the attack.
sentence.Network_cn: 指挥官预先得到敌人要发动袭击的警告。

sentence.Network_en: To be forewarned is to be forearmed.
sentence.Network_cn: 事先得到警告即先有了准备.

PerfectNetExp.abs: My heart forewarned me of your condemnation ., 我的心预先告诉了我对你的定罪.

list.abs: the math ematical model of road traffic security risk forewarning ., 道路交通安全风险预警模糊评判模型.
establishing the administrative system of forewarning mechanism ;, 预警机制管理系统模型的构建;
气候预警模型,Climatic... ... ) Warning model 预警模型 ) forewarning model 预警模型 ) pre-warning model 预警模型.
警源指标,Alert source... ... ) warning index 预警指标 ) forewarning index 预警指标 ) early-warning index 预警指标.

entry.def: If you forewarn someone about something, you warn them in advance that it is going to happen.

example.ex: The Macmillan Guide had forewarned me of what to expect.
example.tran: 《麦克米伦指南》已经事先告诫过我会遇到什么情况。

auth_sentence.content: So be forewarned, put your house in order.
auth_sentence.res_content: So be forewarned, put your house in order.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So be forewarned, put your house in order.

auth_sentence.content: We were forewarned of your coming And shut the gates.
auth_sentence.res_content: We were forewarned of your coming And shut the gates.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We were forewarned of your coming And shut the gates.
